title: Sukitte Ii na yo. (Say "I Love You.")
synopsis: Friends will only let you downâ€”that is the sad truth Mei Tachibana lives with, ever since she was wrongfully blamed for the death of a class pet by her so-called friends in grade school. Since then, she stays away from people in order to avoid ever being hurt again. However, Mei's life begins to change drastically when a misunderstanding in high school causes her to encounter popular student Yamato Kurosawa.
related_anime: ['Sukitte Ii na yo.: Mei and Marshmallow', 'Sukitte Ii na yo.: Dareka ga', 'Suki tte Ii na yo.']
